title: Did Marjorie Taylor Greene Confront a Parkland Shooting Survivor and Call Him a ‘Coward’?
subtitle: The Republican congresswoman from Georgia has come under scrutiny for her promotion of harmful and baseless conspiracy theories, and inflammatory language.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene once followed and shouted at Parkland mass shooting survivor and gun control activist David Hogg.
